00026 #pragma once
00027 
00028 #include <l4/sys/icu.h>
00029 #include <l4/sys/irq.h>
00030 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00031 
00032 namespace L4 {
00033 namespace Protocol { enum { Icu = L4_PROTO_IRQ }; }
00034 namespace Protocol { enum { Irq = L4_PROTO_IRQ }; }
00035 
00036 class Irq_eio : public Kobject_t<Irq_eio, Kobject, L4_PROTO_IRQ>
00037 {
00038   L4_KOBJECT_DISABLE_COPY(Irq_eio)
00039 
00040 public:
00041   l4_msgtag_t unmask(unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t *label, l4_timeout_t to,
00042                      l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00043   { return l4_icu_control_u(cap(), irqnum, L4_ICU_CTL_UNMASK, label, to, utcb); }
00044 };
00045 
00054 class Irq : public Kobject_t<Irq, Irq_eio, L4_PROTO_IRQ>
00055 {
00056   L4_KOBJECT(Irq);
00057 
00058 public:
00059 
00064   l4_msgtag_t attach(l4_umword_t label, Cap<Thread> const &thread,
00065                      l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00066   { return l4_irq_attach_u(cap(), label, thread.cap(), utcb); }
00067 
00072   l4_msgtag_t chain(l4_umword_t label, Cap<Irq> const &slave,
00073                     l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00074   { return l4_irq_chain_u(cap(), label, slave.cap(), utcb); }
00075 
00080   l4_msgtag_t detach(l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00081   { return l4_irq_detach_u(cap(), utcb); }
00082 
00083 
00088   l4_msgtag_t receive(l4_timeout_t to = L4_IPC_NEVER,
00089                       l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00090   { return l4_irq_receive_u(cap(), to, utcb); }
00091 
00096   l4_msgtag_t wait(l4_umword_t *label, l4_timeout_t to = L4_IPC_NEVER,
00097                    l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00098   { return l4_irq_wait_u(cap(), label, to, utcb); }
00099 
00104   l4_msgtag_t unmask(l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00105   { return l4_irq_unmask_u(cap(), utcb); }
00106 
00111   l4_msgtag_t trigger(l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00112   { return l4_irq_trigger_u(cap(), utcb); }
00113 
00114 };
00115 
00116 
00125 class Icu : public Kobject_t<Icu, Irq_eio, L4_PROTO_IRQ>
00126 {
00127   L4_KOBJECT(Icu);
00128 
00129 public:
00130   enum Flow_type
00131   {
00132     F_none       = L4_IRQ_F_NONE,
00133     F_level_high = L4_IRQ_F_LEVEL_HIGH,
00134     F_level_low  = L4_IRQ_F_LEVEL_LOW,
00135     F_pos_edge   = L4_IRQ_F_POS_EDGE,
00136     F_neg_edge   = L4_IRQ_F_NEG_EDGE,
00137     F_mask       = L4_IRQ_F_MASK,
00138   };
00139 
00140   enum Flags
00141   {
00142     F_msi = L4_ICU_FLAG_MSI
00143   };
00144 
00152   class Info : public l4_icu_info_t
00153   {
00154   public:
00155     bool supports_msi() const { return features & F_msi; }
00156   };
00157 
00162   l4_msgtag_t bind(unsigned irqnum, L4::Cap<Irq> irq,
00163                    l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00164   { return l4_icu_bind_u(cap(), irqnum, irq.cap(), utcb); }
00165 
00170   l4_msgtag_t unbind(unsigned irqnum, L4::Cap<Irq> irq,
00171                      l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00172   { return l4_icu_unbind_u(cap(), irqnum, irq.cap(), utcb); }
00173 
00178   l4_msgtag_t info(l4_icu_info_t *info, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00179   { return l4_icu_info_u(cap(), info, utcb); }
00180 
00185   l4_msgtag_t msi_info(unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t *msg,
00186                        l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00187   { return l4_icu_msi_info_u(cap(), irqnum, msg, utcb); }
00188 
00192   l4_msgtag_t control(unsigned irqnum, unsigned op, l4_umword_t *label,
00193                       l4_timeout_t to, l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00194   { return l4_icu_control_u(cap(), irqnum, op, label, to, utcb); }
00195 
00200   l4_msgtag_t mask(unsigned irqnum,
00201                    l4_umword_t *label = 0,
00202                    l4_timeout_t to = L4_IPC_NEVER,
00203                    l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00204   { return l4_icu_mask_u(cap(), irqnum, label, to, utcb); }
00205 
00210   l4_msgtag_t unmask(unsigned irqnum,
00211                      l4_umword_t *label = 0,
00212                      l4_timeout_t to = L4_IPC_NEVER,
00213                      l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00214   { return l4_icu_unmask_u(cap(), irqnum, label, to, utcb); }
00215 
00220   l4_msgtag_t set_mode(unsigned irqnum, l4_umword_t mode,
00221                        l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00222   { return l4_icu_set_mode_u(cap(), irqnum, mode, utcb); }
00223 };
00224 
00225 }
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
